content.query:
DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS dbmedical
GO
CREATE DATABASE dbMedical
GO
USE dbMedical
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE AzureOpenData
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://sac7a.dfs.core.windows.net')

CREATE VIEW viewMedical AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sac7a.dfs.core.windows.net/conc7a/medicaldata/part-00000-593b9fae-0bcb-482f-a82c-89f01839729b-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
